official_title: Project ACCESS: a Pilot Randomized Controlled Trial of a Navigator Delivered Model to Enhance Access to Supportive Services for Women of Color with Metastatic Breast Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Women â‰¥18 years of age
* English and/or Spanish speaking
* Self-identify as Latina and/or African American/Black
* Ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent
* Stage IV breast cancer diagnosis, no time component
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Moderate to severe cognitive impairment
* receiving inpatient hospice care
* if patients were previously enrolled in Aim 1 and Aim 2
* currently working with a community navigator
